reviews.text: Timbuktu is infinity plus infinity plus infinity plus infinity and beyond, fantastic and brilliant,best fun ever. They are the words from my grandchildren 8yrs and 6yrs. They loved making new friends,all the activities,arts n crafts,an outing,BBQ, water slide,sandpit,all the things to ride and climb on and games. All the staff are amazing,so welcoming,friendly and caring for each child's needs. Healthy lunches given and plenty to drink to keep them hydrated. I recommend Timbuktu to any parent or grandparents who are looking for a fun,safe environment for our energetic kids. Thankyou Timbuktu.    JULIE TOMLINSON.XXX

My children, aged 7 and 9 (a boy and a girl); have been going to Timbuktu for the past year. They absolutely love going there. It is one of the few activities they do which always gets a thumbs up. In the holidays they can go every day and I keep expecting them to say they want to do something different but they keep wanting to go every day!! Part of that is the exciting activities planned each day, like Easter egg hunting, slime making, go-kart making, the disco. There is a big outdoor play area, with sand and water play, swings, slide and climbing frames . It is absolutely fantastic for them to go there in the evening, where they get lots of exercise and social interaction, compared to sitting at home on their phones or watching telly. They would even rather go there than the park with me because their friends are there and there are more activities. The staff are absolutely lovely, caring people who I feel completely confident to trust my children's well being with.  I feel so lucky to have Timbuktu nearby as it provides everything children need for healthy physical, emotional, social  and even brain  development.    This is especially needed in today's environment of fear about letting children play outside by themselves with their friends. Here they can play with their friends in a safe and stimulating environment. Brilliant!

My son  and I attend the Saturday family days on a regular basis, it is a great friendly environment with so much to do from amazing crafts, activities inside and lets not forget the amazing playground. There is so much to do we stay there from start to finish. The staff  there are so helpful, amazing and involve everyone in all activities.
the other children who attend are so friendly, kind and caring and are always willing to help.

The best thing about Timbuktu is how children can explore and learn in a safe place and how the centre has a massive community feel which is entirely child lead. my only regret about Timbuktu is not finding it sooner.
Great place my daughter enjoyed every minute of it üòÅ

Great laid back atmosphere.  Professional staff on site with positive attitude. Children are encouraged to play freely and explore and are given opportunities make decisions and take positive risk under supervision. Family like atmosphere.

address: 31 Grenville Rd, Finsbury Park, London N19 4EJ, United Kingdom
